content: आयः [आ इ-अच्, अय्-घञ् वा] {@--1@} Arrival, approach. {@--2@} Gaining or acquisition of money, acquiring (<ab>opp.</ab> व्यय); आये दुःखं व्यये दुःखं <ls>Pt. 1. 163.</ls> {@--3@} Income, revenue, receipt; ग्रामेषु स्वामिग्राह्यो भाग आयः <ls>Sk.</ls>; <ls>Y. 1. 322</ls>, <ls n="Y. 1.">326</ls>; <ls>Mk. 2. 6</ls>; आयद्वाराणि <ls>Dk. 162</ls> sources of income; आयव्ययौ च नियतावाकरान् कोषमेव च <ls>Ms. 8. 419</ls>; आयाधिकं व्ययं करोति he lives beyond his means. {@--4@} Gain, profit. {@--5@} The eleventh house (in astrology). {@--6@} The guard of the women's apartments.
